content.rendered:
our listings

Residential rentals

3-Bedroom 2-Bathroom Home in Tupapa FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

This recently renovated fully furnished rental home has a quiet elevated location, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and spacious indoor/outdoor living

Property ID: 2023-14

  • Private elevated location in the vicinity of the Cook Islands National Auditorium & Museum in Tupapa
  • Fully furnished 3 bedroom home, 2 bathrooms, spacious lounge/dining, open kitchen, extensive covered verandas, set on a generous-sized section with fruit trees and flowers
  • Complete with insect screens, UV filtered water system
  • Long-term rental property - available now for minimum 12 month fixed term

$525.00 per week including lawns maintenance

Applications closed
COMING SOON: 2-Bedroom 2-Bathroom Home In Tutakimoa FOR MID-TERM RENTAL

This fully-furnished rental home has a quiet elevated location in town, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom+1 ensuite, spacious indoor/outdoor living and sea views

Property ID: 2023-06

  • Private elevated location in Tutakimoa, within walking distance to Nukutere College and amenities in Avarua CBD
  • Fully furnished 2 bedroom home, 2 bathrooms & separate wc, spacious lounge/dining, open kitchen, and extensive covered deck with panoramic sea view
  • Long-term rental property - available from late December 2023 to mid-June 2024
  • Suited to couple or mature persons

$500.00 per week includes lawns maintenance

TENANTED
2-Bedroom Unit In Vaimaanga FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

Fully furnished duplex unit with elevated location facing the sea

Property ID: 2023-9

  • Elevated location in Vaimaanga, within short walking distance of Wigmores SuperStore
  • Fully-furnished duplex unit with quality furniture, open-plan living/dining/kitchen, 2-bedrooms, separate bathroom and WC, laundry room, and private carport
  • Ocean-facing covered deck with sea views
  • Insect screens, solar hot water, ceiling fans throughout, air-conditioned living/dining area
  • Long-term rental property - available from mid-September 2023 for minimum 12-month fixed term

$425.00 per week 

Tenanted
2-Bedroom Home In Tutakimoa FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

This fully-furnished rental home has a quiet elevated location in town, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, open-plan living/kitchen, and carport

Property ID: 2023-13

  • Private elevated location in Tutakimoa, within walking distance to Nukutere College and amenities in Avarua CBD
  • Fully furnished 2 bedroom home, bathroom, separate wc, open-plan lounge/dining/kitchen, laundry room, covered terrace, and carport
  • Complete solar power system for cost-free electricity
  • Long-term rental property - available now for minimum 12 month fixed term

$400.00 per week includes lawns maintenance

Tenanted
3-Bedroom 2-Bathroom Home In Avana FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

This furnished quality rental home has a desirable quiet location, large private section, and spacious indoor/outdoor living – available mid July 2023

Property ID: 2023-1

  • Desirable quiet location in Avana, handy to Te Oki Au school and 15 minutes drive from town
  • Furnished home with 3 bedrooms, 2-bathrooms, high ceilings, large covered verandah, carport, insect screens, air-conditioning in 2-bedrooms, ceiling fans
  • Large half-acre flat-level section with view of the mountains
  • Spacious open-plan kitchen, master bedroom with ensuite bathroom & walk-in wardrobe and private patio, laundry room

$500.00 per week includes lawns maintenance

Tenanted
2-Bedroom 1-Bathroom Home In Inave FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

Modern furnished rental home in Inave 

Property ID: 2023-12

  • Peaceful secluded location in Inave, handy to amenities
  • Modern furnished 2-bedroom 1-bathroom home, open-plan kitchen/living area, covered verandah, private garden
  • Mosquito screened windows, air-conditioned lounge
  • Long-term rental property - available NOW for minimum 12-month term

$435.00 per week includes lawns maintenance

Tenanted
2-Bedroom 2-Bathroom Home In Tukuvaine FOR MID-TERM RENTAL

Modern furnished rental home handy to town – available from early Jun 2024 til mid-Jan 2025

Property ID: 2023-11

  • Peaceful secluded location in Tukuvaine valley with mountain backdrop, handy to Avarua CBD
  • Modern furnished 2-bedroom 2-bathroom home with quality furnishings, open-plan kitchen/living area, large covered verandah, undercover parking
  • Mosquito screened windows, ceiling fans throughout, air-conditioned master bedroom, filtered water
  • Mid-term rental property - available from early June 2024 til mid-January 2025 (7.5 months)

$600.00 per week includes lawns maintenance

AVAILABLE
3-Bedroom 2-Bathroom Home In Inave FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

Fully furnished rental home with elevated location, spacious indoor/outdoor living with extensive wrap-around decks and panoramic sea views  

Property ID: 2019-5

  • Peaceful elevated location off back road in Inave, Arorangi
  • Fully-furnished executive-style home with 3-air-conditioned bedrooms, 2-ensuite bathrooms, high ceilings, insect screens, ceiling fans
  • Panoramic sea views
  • Spacious open-plan kitchen/dining/living area, and master bedroom with its own ensuite bathroom

$550.00 per week

Tenanted
2-Bedroom Unit In Vaimaanga FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

Fully furnished duplex unit with elevated location facing the sea

Property ID: 2023-10

  • Elevated location in Vaimaanga, within short walking distance of Wigmores SuperStore
  • Fully-furnished duplex unit with quality furniture, open-plan living/dining/kitchen, 2-bedrooms, separate bathroom and WC, laundry room, and private carport
  • Ocean-facing covered deck with sea views
  • Insect screens, solar hot water, ceiling fans throughout, air-conditioned living/dining area

$425.00 per week 

Tenanted
3-Bedroom Home In Ruatonga FOR LONG-TERM RENTAL

Fully furnished home with volumes of space including 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and wrap-around verandahs

Property ID: 2023-8

  • Residential location in Ruatonga, very handy to Avarua CBD
  • Furnished home with generous size living/dining/kitchen, 3-bedrooms, 2-bathrooms, spacious walk-in wardrobe, open-plan living/dining/kitchen, laundry room, and wrap-around verandahs
  • Insect screens

$550.00 per week including lawns maintenance 

Tenanted
